org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.ui_default.indexpage.content

Interface IContentComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, java.io.Serializable, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable, com.vaadin.navigator.View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentsView, BatchesView, DatasetsView, ExpandableView, TestExpandableView, TestView, UnimplementedView, UserAgentsView, UserBatchesView, UserDatasetsView, UserProfileView, UsersView, WelcomeView

    public interface IContentComponent
extends com.vaadin.navigator.View, com.vaadin.ui.Component
    Implementations of this interface are to be used as content components for IndexPage.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

      void beforeClose()
      If close is confirmed in the dialog, this method will be called prior to closing the view.

      If isReadyToClose() returns true, this method is called and should return the message that will be shown in the close-confirming dialog.

    • Method Detail

      • isReadyToClose

        boolean isReadyToClose()
        Programmatic check whether the view can be closed.

      • getCloseMessage

        java.lang.String getCloseMessage()
        If isReadyToClose() returns true, this method is called and should return the message that will be shown in the close-confirming dialog. User needs to approve of it as well.

      • beforeClose

        void beforeClose()
        If close is confirmed in the dialog, this method will be called prior to closing the view.
